ROW.TEXT: N, A, EDI001A, MQ, APPL, A, 01, 002, EMAIL

ROW.MAP: <situation name="MQ_EDISA_CurrDepth_adv" ><class name="ITM_Queue_Statistics" /><slot slotName="msg" ><literalString value="MQ--Queue $Queue_Statistics.Queue_Name$ Has A Current Depth Of $Queue_Statistics.Current_Depth$ On $Queue_Statistics.Origin_Node$" /></slot><slot slotName="msg_catalog" ><literalString value="noshow" /></slot><slot slotName="NotifyAction" ><literalString value="11" /></slot><slot slotName="NotifyCategory" ><literalString value="2" /></slot><slot slotName="NotifyEmailGroup" ><literalString value="username@email.com" /></slot></situation>
